product_name: The North Face Condor Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Boys'
long_description: Winter adventures should be fun! The North Face Condor Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket for boys shields young skiers and riders from rain, snow and cold, so they can enjoy the great outdoors all day long. Zip and snap the shell jacket and insulating fleece liner jacket together for the ultimate in waterproof warmth, or wear either piece solo as the weather warrants. HyVent(R) nylon shell with fully sealed seams creates a waterproof, breathable barrier to offer dry comfort. Drawcord hem and rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs keep out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable heat. Hood and zippered handwarmer pockets keep key areas cozy. Polyester fleece liner jacket in The North Face Atlas Triclimate boys' jacket features hand pockets.
